attributes.action: Allow Displaced Skilled Workers Work At least 20 Hours To Sustain Themselves
attributes.additional_details: It’s simply because of the retinue of displaced skilled worker (particularly healthcare professionals) whose families are at the moment struggling to cope with cost of living here and there that I as a person have met and interacted with through my social media platform, and is now more like a community of displaced workers in the UK
attributes.background: The Government or Parliament should help repeal the law being restraining other employers from hiring any displaced skilled worker from working with them if they are not currently working for their primary employer, whose license is revoked or does not have the jobs promised the affected employees

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730717
